website_summaries.verdict: With plenty of storage pockets and a large, clear tablet compartment this option covers all your on the go entertainment needs.
pros: Sturdy, but flexible enough to be safe
Waterproof surface is easy to keep clean
Ample storage space for toys, books, bottles, or stationery
Large, clear tablet pouch allows littles to comfortably watch their favorite shows
Raised walls and piping along the front keep items in place
cons: Side walls are just a tad too flexible
Tablet covers need to be removed to fit in the pocket

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel tray!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this travel tray for holiday car travels and I am very pleased. The quality is excellent and it was on sale which made it even better. Our son is enjoying playing with his toys on it. It has also been great for eating on the road. I have already suggested this product to several friends with small children.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Fun, Washable
customer_reviews.text: No more crying toddlers in my van, they are so entertained with this tray. it has so many activities. It contains dedicated sections for holding things like games and drawing supplies. The front pocket can be used to accommodate a tablet or several small items, and a robust front rim prevents things from rolling off. The tray has tons of compartments to hold everything your child could possibly need.
customer_reviews.author: Erik H

customer_reviews.title: A Game Changer for Long or Short road trips!
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time for a long road trip and my 3 year old grandson loved this set up. He was able to look at his pad while coloring or writing or playing with his other toys and it made snack time wonderful serving as a table. Just awesome all around. It fit wonderfully over the car seat and we use it on short and long trips. It’s also easy to clean. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Iceem

customer_reviews.title: We all love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy that this tray lived up to the positive reviews. We haven’t used it for travel yet, but my 3 year old really Likes it for snacks on our couch and for coloring. It’s definitely well-made. The unexpected added bonus is that he LOVES using it to practice reading letters - he will sit and look at them himself, and tonight was the second time he asked someone to point to the pictures of animals on the tray so he can identify the letter. My parents like it so much they’re getting one too for when they are caring for our son.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Study while in place but flexible if you need to fold and put away
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product and so does my granddaughter. It’s eye appealing to her sturdy and easy to clean for me. Very handy for a drink, pencils or crayons and several other items. Also really like the removable iPad holder. One thing I’d love to see changed....the picture card that came with the box was very helpful but I’d love to see a more diverse set of children.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great even for older kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my daughter for a long car ride and she really enjoyed having a place to store all her art supplies. The tablet holder is also very handy. Good quality and easy to clean. I bought another for a gift now!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and worth the rush shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I’m seriously impressed with this tray! I was expecting it to be somewhat flimsy because it’s a kids product but was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy and well made it is. I’m pretty surprised this product isn’t in a Target. It will be a lifesaver for my toddlers upcoming flight and future road trips. It did smell chemical-ly right out of the package but just leave it out overnight and it will be good to go! Worth the fee for one day shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for car
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a snack tray for my 3.5-year-old. I have used it about 5 times so far and really like it. It is easy to attach and remove, easy to clean, and large enough to fit my son’s lunch box, drink, and toys with plenty of room left. Just ordered a second one for my 2-year-old, who was jealous of her brother’s new tray!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This travel tray was so easy to use! Sets up quickly, but folds away flat for easy storage. It sat very secure with my 3 year olds car seat. I bought this with little expectation, but now wonder how car life worked before it! We have not yet used the ipad holder portion - it seems pretty straight forward, my only concern would be sound once inside the plastic, but there is a zipper side you can open for headphone cords/speaker sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stacye Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely purposeful
customer_reviews.text: Love the car tray. It has so many pockets and the alphabet design on the top had my two year old son entertained as soon as we put it on. The tablet holder was great and you can use tablet through the plastic cover. Definitely recommend buying the tray if your child loves to color, play with small toys, or play on the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Travel Tray
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved from Atlanta to Georgia. My 8 year old generally drops and tries to balance everything in her lap. This tray was amazing. She was able to eat and watch her tablet with out getting the tablet dirty. She also enjoyed drawing and writing in her diary. Now she doesn’t even want to go for a 15 minute ride with out this in her lap!
customer_reviews.author: T Clark

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids happy
customer_reviews.text: We had problems with the kids making messes all over themselves in the car and throwing things around, since we bought this it has helped them have a play space while we make the long trips to Grandmas house. Thank you!! love it
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister's kid. My sister was saying that she needed something like this for her daughter on long car rides and this thing is just the thing! She told me she loves it and her daughter is really enjoying using it!
customer_reviews.author: Abu Hummus

customer_reviews.title: Great help for my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This was far the best car seat travel tray I've tried in terms of quality and functionality. Great for older kids to put on take off, and adjust on their own. perfect travel accessory for your toddler/child so they don’t go totally crazy on long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tray for the little one to travel with!
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to assemble and disassemble and store away. It provided a place for my son to play with his toys and eat his snacks, he also uses it to draw on with the flat surface it provides. Loving this product so far, also great customer service from Beloved Belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is as stated and the extra tablet holder is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works for rear facing too!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried how this would work since my daughter is still rear facing but it was great. Loved it especially for the tablet holder, which my Samsung fit perfectly. Great for road trips!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR A THREE YEAR OLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Drove from Chicago to Orlando (and back) with a 3 1/2 year old in a minivan. This was just what I was looking for. He was able to work on it (legos, cars, books) with very little assistance (nothing fell to the floor!). I didn't secure it around his car seat and it still worked as he was able to put it on and off when he wanted it. Worked well for watching the tablet as well! Very sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great handy travel tray!
customer_reviews.text: This travel tray is so sturdy and durable it’s perfect for any lap table option! Tons of pockets and a sleeve for a tablet too - can’t get better than this!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Hale

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for our 4 and 6 yo boys for a long roadtrip. They used them a little on the first day and then they sat on the seat beside the boys, unused, taking up valuable space for the rest of the trip. The product seems well built but neither of my kids could see the point. Also, they don't stay on a car seat without snapping a strap that runs behind the seat, and that process is cumbersome every time we get in and out and the kids didn't want to bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Jobsky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fast arrival
customer_reviews.text: Love this it looks great, we’re going on a road trip soon so this will be great. Good quality, however I didn’t like that the tablet holder doesn’t have some sort of stopper or Velcro on the front so it won’t slide. Over all very happy
customer_reviews.author: Emilee penn

customer_reviews.title: Keep kids occupied for hours on the road
customer_reviews.text: Three year old loves her travel tray. Keeps her happy and occupied on short or long trips in the car.
customer_reviews.author: NormaJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the kids travel tray I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Tore on first use but received replacement
customer_reviews.text: Daughter only used for one road trip and pulled the buckle and it ripped right off. Cheaply made if a 3 yr old tugs on a strap and it rips the whole thing off. Now I can’t use, was way overpriced for the quality UPDATE: excellent customer service. Contacted me without ever even contacting them first and have sent a replacement in the mail already. Hopefully this one will last longer!
customer_reviews.author: KClune

customer_reviews.title: Convenient ♡
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I would refer it for anyone who's looking to have something for their child to have a tray for their lap for snacks or ipad . I love it so does my son ♡
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great product for road trips
customer_reviews.text: We are planning to do some road trips this year and I found this at amazon, I put it on my truck and it fit perfectly. My son especially likes to play his magnetic tiles on it. I bought two different brands to try and I like this one much better: the color, the animals prints and the customer service. I had a little problem and contacted the Owner, he Immediately reaponded and solved it. I can't wait to use it for the next trip. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: meiliqunli2000

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt stay in and my 2 year old hates it. It's too flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Styers

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We haven't taken our long road trips with these yet, but my boys love them, they fit well and seem to be exactly what we need for the trips. Sturdy, easy to use, hold things in place, etc. Will try to update after some months of use.
customer_reviews.author: DanaMinby

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for ROAD TRIPS or quick trips in the car
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's study and made from high quality materials. the adjustable waist belt can fit any size kid. The tablet holder is great for smaller devices although It won't fit an ipad in a case. My girls are 4 and 6 and it is perfect for road trips. I love all the different compartments which makes it great for holding snacks, crayons/pencils, books, stickers etc. I love that it can be uses for watching TV, snacks/meals on the go, has a cup holder and can be used like a lap desk. Versatile and practical and well made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Like this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good for children having good time inside car, specially in long trips. Very easy to put it up for use and break it down and store behind trunk without use a lot space. Also the material easy to clean when get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: WIGIANTO WIGIANTO

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Use and simple to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I took our kids on a long trip (6 States away) so we bought this travel tray for our 3 year old. We are happy that we did, the travel tray was perfect for using electronics, playing with toys, coloring and perfect for food with a convenient mesh pocket for drinks and it is very easy to clean; we used wet wipes and it cleaned off easily. I highly recommend this travel tray.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M

customer_reviews.title: Great for the road, but not made well.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of having a tray for my 3 year old on our road trip. She was able to color and eat with ease. The only issue is the ability to clean this and the sturdiness of the tray. Within a week the back already ripped, and within 2 weeks the zippers fell off. I am very disappointed because she enjoyed her tray so much. It also is difficult to clean. I wish there was a way to remove the cloth to throw in the wash, but because she ate on it, it is already stained.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...
customer_reviews.text: Worst Amazon purchase ever! It doesn’t stand up like it shows in the picture, it is a safety hazard because it requires that it be strapped around the child, making it difficult to get out of the car quickly if necessary and all around annoying. The products they give as bonus activities are misspelled. Overall, I a, very unhappy and did not see any other reviews like this.
customer_reviews.author: ThomFam

customer_reviews.title: surface cannot be used for toys with suction cups
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 18 month old niece. I was hoping the tray table had a smooth enough surface so that I could attach travel toys with suction cups. That didn't work out so I traded it with the baby's mother who has a tablet and I took her tray that has a smooth surface. We're both satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Him Busy!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this tray, he likes to do artwork while we drive around. The flat surface helps keep all his artwork and coloring markers in one place. I like it for the convenience it provides after he is done, it makes for an easy cleanup. The quality seems very nice.
customer_reviews.author: SOMASD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pink Color - very sturdy - easy to clean - my daughter won't let go of it :-)
customer_reviews.text: Our special needs daughter needed something that was flexible yet sturdy to keep in place all her electronic devices etc. She loves PINK and she won't let go of this. At home and in the car - she uses all the time. She's had it now for over a week and still looks new. Very sturdy yet flexible and the straps are very helpful. The shipment was quick and the packaging showed care for the delivery of the product. We are very pleased and so is our daughter. We highly recommend. Thank you 👨🏻‍💻👩🏻‍⚕️👧🏻
customer_reviews.author: Hector John Rubert

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my daughter. I did lots of research on other similar items and the main complaint I saw for this item was that once the tablet holder was removed from the base it became flimsy. A simple fix for this makes it perfect. I bought a cutting board for four dollars 9x12 and it was a perfect fit. I didn't have any problems keeping the tablet where it was supposed to be. The pockets fit everything I needed to keep my daughter entertained for a moderate journey. The true test is yet to come when we have to make a six hour long drive to our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Charlies WifeTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds tablet well
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 yo isn't really a fan of this, and he's a little short to be able to use it well (it's just below his ribs, needs to be more like waist level), however I can tell this will be good when he gets older. It works well for rear facing (if anything it's easier to buckle around the back of the seat!) and holds my large Galaxy tab nicely. It doesn't have plastic over the tray as many of these do so that makes it a little more difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Tenley

customer_reviews.title: Product incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two trays a few months back as gifts for birthdays this month. I gave to my grand daughters and one tray has the back flap on backwards so you can’t use it .. the Velcro is on the wrong side. Of course I’m past my time to return so I guess next time I won’t buy in advance unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Emrick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful😍
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful well-made product I highly recommend it it is fun and easy to clean and keep the child occupied thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son. Great for eating, drawing, coloring, and everything in between. It's very sturdy and keeps him busy. Makes trips easier. Very easy to install and easy to remove. Haven't used the tablet feature of it, but do like that it's there. It's very easy to clean as well. If you're looking for something like this buy it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: jhanks23

customer_reviews.title: Great for air travel for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for air travel and future use in car for our 3 year old. It was easy to set up and worked perfectly on the airplane, allowing him to color, read, eat and use ipad more independently. We were able to carry it in one of our larger backpacks, but it was too large to fit in his smaller backpack. Highly recommend and I’m sure ours will see a lot of future car time use, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: loved these so much i bought three for our three grandkids. they are amazingly easy to install, firm enough to stay a desk tons of pocket space and the kids loved them. mostly the parents loved them
customer_reviews.author: sheri stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great travel desk for kids
customer_reviews.text: We like how this stores flat when not in use to tuck behind or under a seat as to keep in vehicle. All of the storage spaces are great to keep child entertained for our longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for out 3+ road trips. Hooks to the carseat just like explained... only thing that was a bit difficult for me was my daughters seat has arm rests and I had to force the tray under those in order for it to full wrap around the seat and buckle. But other then that my daughter colors, eats and watches the iPad on it. The little holders for markers and water bottle is great
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Long trips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my friend who has small children. Every time I see him he says thank you for this gift. They frequently take long trips and said it’s been such a great help. Would recommend to anyone especially those with small children!
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for airplane rides!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray!! I used it for my two year old on a plane trip we took recently. I was able to strap it around his car seat in the plane and he could use it instead of the nasty tray table (which has to be up during takeoff and landing anyway). The little side pockets were perfect for me to keep his markers in and they edges kept stuff from rolling off. He’s still rear-facing in the car so I don’t use it there yet, but I’ll definitely start using it for longer trips when he’s front-facing.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for reaching out to confirm I received my order . I recieved it fairly quickly and I love It ! My son loves It as well . Comes with a tablet holder as well and definitely makes it easier on longer car rides where my toddler wants to look at a picture book , play toys, or just be on his tablet .
customer_reviews.author: Aliah

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel tray. I like that is can be used with a carseat or a booster seat. The only thing I wish I could change would be the fabric on the tray. It would probably be better if it was something you could wipe off especially if you were using it to let your child eat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Trying product out for a road trip. So far, so good. Tray contains food and art stuff well. Also moves out of the way easily. iPad holder doesn't have venting or let sound out, so headphones/speakers are needed. Tray isn't as wide as carseat, but still works well, even while not strapped. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Y.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not wowed. The sides don’t stay up when using the strap and it doesn’t fit well at all. Sits lopsided. So not of great use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough for carseat/booster
customer_reviews.text: It did NOT fit in my 4 year old carseat/booster seat. It's a grow with me carseat that is height adjustable without having to take off the seatbealt or carseat and even at the tray's longest length it did NOT go around to connect on the other side. It looks promising but wasn't able to really use it for the trip I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy and confining
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren did not like the feeling of the tray being strapped around them, it made them feel very confined. Tablet does not fit in the ipad holder with cover on. Was not that happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moore

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: The back part was ripped a bit on one of them when we took it out of the packaging but we were getting on the road the next day so we didn’t pay it any kind. Other then that it’s a great product and saved us with our toddlers traveling across country and back twice this summer! I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Must have for toddler!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cross country move, just me and my toddler. It was a lifesaver! From coloring in the car to eating on the drive. This thing held everything and made my life so much easier! Now we use when I'm running errands to keep her entertained. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for traveling. I wish my child had been old enough to use, he kept tilting it downwards . But it seems well made and durable with Velcro sides so it should hold up over time. Lots of little pockets too
customer_reviews.author: Courtney4747

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend if you can sew.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 ,1 arrived broken I had to sew the tablet holder back together it was hanging off and the zipper broke off . I had to sew all of the seems as it was cheaply done . By this I mean all the stitches were loose . Loved the product after I reinforced the seems . Kids loved it
customer_reviews.author: Rg

customer_reviews.title: worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: did exactly what it was supposed to, our road trips will be much easier now. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: 38Actions_

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for road trips
customer_reviews.text: It does what is says it should do! I wish the sides that can hold the markers or snacks where made with sturdier material so it could stand up better on its own. But that may not make the product better. It still works very well the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: cici

customer_reviews.title: Too high for my car seat
customer_reviews.text: Check the height of the arms/sides of your car seat/booster first. This sits on top of them, so if they are too high, the table will rest up at kids’ chest level and be awkward for them to use. It’s not really the product’s fault, but it’s just not practical for some car seat designs like mine.
customer_reviews.author: P M

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: My toddler broke the strap off within 5 minutes of using it. I didn't think she was THAT strong so this really sucks. The only way to use it now would be me buying the type of thread & needle that could reattach the strap to the tray....
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly and my son loves it! He immediately wanted to try it out and we haven't even left for our car trip! No odor as noted on some other reviews of travel trays. Was provided with instructions for use prior to arrival of the travel tray so I already knew how to set up the tablet holder but like that we can remove it when not in use. sturdy sides make it to where my son won't lose his cars while he plays with them. a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: good for kids
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our grandson for a road trip. We really like it but the only problem is we had to strap it around him to keep it in place, so this made it hard for him to sleep with. Otherwise.. great!
customer_reviews.author: just shopping

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for toddlers who don't need another toy. We use these trays for traveling. They are the best car seat accessory. I would recommend buying each child passenger their own.
customer_reviews.author: Littlebitmh

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel but unnecessarily large
customer_reviews.text: Not quite easy to clean as there are many crevices. Additionally, it’s way too big and takes so much room. Quite unnecessarily large, however, I do like this lap desk for traveling to keep my kid entertained. Best for long road trips but be informed that this thing is huge.
customer_reviews.author: WeLikeAmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a great fit for our kid.
customer_reviews.text: It is great until your child wants it off...then you can't really do much while driving. Also it's bulky so when not in use it's in our way. However, it works just like it's supposed to...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Viau

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 5 & 3. These are a MUST HAVE for a long trip. Bought these for driving 13 hours to Disney & my kids were SOO well behaved having these on their laps for their snacks & activities. Also kept the backseat a little cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but take up space
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea- but it does take up a bit of space. If you have a smaller car with 3 people in the back it would be a very tight fit. I love that it folds down flat when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest it to parents with a long trip coming up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little travel “table”. Took it and his car seat on a plane and passengers said they wished it was around when their kids were little. My son wanted it off after a little because he felt constricted. And it tends to lean in towards child and cars rolled to him - so not ideal for that. His tablet has the big protection around it, so we didn’t use the included tablet section, but was able to prop it up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: zumbadee

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and fits very well in my sons car seat. It is very sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Enables creative , hands on activity in the car
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for grand daughters ages two and four . Big thumbs up from all parents as a fabulous way to help children stay actively engaged with creative play while in the car . Our four year old grand daughter couldn't wait to use in the car and found it worked fine on the dining room table . Every child should have one of these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing you could ever get for your child when you're going to be traveling with them. My son can eat his snacks color, watch his cartoons on his tablet that sits right on the tray with the holder, and play with toys in his lap on a flat surface. This is a very durable worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Farcas

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for road trips. We traveled for two full days ... My kid loved it. He was able to draw, put little cars on it ... we did some beads as well... great product ...
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We got these for a cross country trip. We bought 2, one for our 5 year old and one for our 3 year old. The 5 year old loved it. She used it to color on and do activity books on. Our 3 year was not crazy about it. She didn’t like how it was positioned with her car seat. We loved that it fit comfortably on the center console of our truck so we could put the iPad in the sleeve and both kids could watch the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ritzert

customer_reviews.title: Parents ,you need this !
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray! It’s durable, easy to clean , and my daughter loves it! Not sure how I traveled without this for so long!!! If your a working parent who travels a lot with their child, you have to have this product in your life !!!
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect for my toddler boys when we go out of town, keeps them entertained and when eating snacks/food we have less mess to clean up! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: heatherr

customer_reviews.title: Velcro I’m wrong places
customer_reviews.text: The velcro for the iPad stand was on the wrong side. It doesn’t go together as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!! Best quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing must have for any long car ride!! The slot to put the iPad in is so perfect for toddlers who like to press the iPad buttons! Makes life easier. We used this for a 12 hour car ride and it made it so convenient for my son to have a space to color and eat and play! Would definitely recommend is 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 year old to take on a 3+ day road trip to Grandma's house. Made a good activity table, snack time tray and held 7" tablet for movies. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Must have for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this! It is so sturdy and perfect for my toddler to pass the time in the car. Well thought out design. My older kids are bad they didn't have one when they were small!
customer_reviews.author: Dirttrack Dorie

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to use on a plane with a car seat. Not worth it, flimsy in some aspects and awkward to carry
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten to use this yet but I have checked it out well and it seems to be very well made. And is very portable. I am sure we get much use out of this in our travels.
customer_reviews.author: chele

customer_reviews.title: Good lap tray
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandkids as they were going on a long road trip. Ages 2 and 4. They still use them. Provides play area for traveling. And good for feeding snacks on the go.
customer_reviews.author: feline7

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and kids loved them
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for a trip. They worked great. I do wish they were maybe 2 inches wider though. They were great and sturdy enough for my 5 year old and 2 year old to colorz do puzzles, play watch their tablets etc. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old daughter to use on a 10 hour road trip. It was awesome. So awesome, in fact, she has to use it every time we get in the car now.
customer_reviews.author: brehard1010

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Super great item. My son loves it and now I dont have to worry about him dropping his cup or toys. I havent figured out the tablet thing yet but i love the product
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rosero

customer_reviews.title: Kids travel tray is a smart purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Kids travel tray is great for short or long trips, and my grandson loves this for his drinks, eats and tablet! Smart idea for toddlers especially.
customer_reviews.author: calam

customer_reviews.title: My kids love their tray's!
customer_reviews.text: I order two of these for upcoming road trips and they are amazing! They work wonders for when you're eating in the car and it's great for the kids to be able to have flat service to color and hold their tablets and DVD players. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Snell

customer_reviews.title: Myst have for road trips
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase we made for our 16hr road trip with 2 pre-schoolers. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Juliane

customer_reviews.title: So far, its Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing travel companion for by daughter. Really good quality materials that hold up to the fun time-abuse it's been getting. Perfect color choice too, hides dirt marks, easy to clean, still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver on a road trip!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 3 year old for a 16 hour road trip. It was AMAZING!! He loved having his own special battle station. He could color, prop his tablet, have a snack, you name it! Easy to turn around and unlatch from the front seat if he needed a break, and then reconnect when he was ready to “work” again! Sturdy and fantastic fabric and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my kids stroller, his car seat and anywhere else i can. He loves it and so do I. Great little product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old Grandaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old grandaughter for their 10 hour road trip. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Makes life a little simpler
customer_reviews.text: This travel tray really helps keep my daughter busy in the car so she doesn't make a fuzz or cry. She enjoys drawing on the tray with her markers. The side pockets can fit her favorite toys and bottle. Would highly recommend. Super fast shipping and personal follow-up notes received from the founder.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Really nice travel tray for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Works great for toddler. Bought to go to Florida . Works in car fine. Also uses on floor. Great fabric, seems like will last awhile
customer_reviews.author: Super G

customer_reviews.title: Great amazon find!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed the way we travel my daughter loves it! She loves that she can watch her iPad and eat her food while we are on the road
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A sturdily built tray
customer_reviews.text: Very practical for keeping the kid busy with his toys and tablet while traveling. Besides being very useful, it looks also well built and that it's going to last until the kid grows up :)
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our kids
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it and it’s duper convenient to use even outside of travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great for car trips!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a car trip to Disney for my toddler. He loves using it for coloring and to play with his toys on.

customer_reviews.title: Played with right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: My great nieces loved it, i had to buy second. I thought it would be useful on long car rides but they played with it before it even go installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Kids Travel Tray for Toddler Car Seat | Toddler Car Seat Tray Organizer | Large ipad Holder A Road Trip Essential | Soft Padding, Waterproof, Food & Snack Lap Tray Carseat, Stroller, and High Chair
feature_bullets: 🧡 SPILL-PROOF | FOOD, DRINK, DROOL … Clean up the mess in one swipe of the waterproof, BPA free surface (instead of all over the floor). Your carpets & lower back will thank you.
🧡 ANTI-SAG WALLS THICK ZIPPER … Many kids car organizer tend to sag & dump items onto the floor. The 3” tall reinforced walls are sturdy still flexible enough for safety in case of accidents.
🧡 CONTAINED PORTABLE ENTERTAINMENT … Engage toddlers with all their favorite toy without creating a massive clean up job. They get all of the access without you needing to constantly pick things up.
🧡 UNFOLD & GO | CAR, HIGHCHAIR, ANYWHERE … The patented easy-fold design fits toddler car seats, airplane seats, high chairs, & keeps babies busy in any travel situation, and less "ARE WE THERE YET".
🧡 STRONG BUT SAFE CONSTRUCTION … Children’s Safety is the # 1 priority & close behind is the sturdiness of the lap tray. Sturdy enough to support a tablet & toys but soft enough for safety.
